concept.title: Draw up a map: creating a product roadmap
concept.shortdesc: A thorough explanation of what a roadmap is, especially for a startup.

conbody.p: Your vision is constant, your strategy can change, and your roadmap needs to adapt and keep up with feedback. It's a 'living' document you should check regularly. There are many roadmap templates you can use for visualization: goal-oriented roadmaps, Jira boards, Gantt charts, or a simple timeline. Choose what works for you. Consider who youâ€™re sharing your roadmap with (internal teams, investors, or potential customers) and the level of detail you want to convey.
